name: Anime Themed Videogame - Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc
blurb: An Anime themed HD 2D strategy defense game with RPG mechanics and a linear storyline for PC, Mac, Linux, WP8, iOS, and Android.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Thank you for your support! The game's going to be awesome!
************************************************
You and other pledgers will be notified when the game's first official wallpaper is released!
************************************************
NOTES FOR REWARDS
************************************************
All rewards are digital and they are delivered after  or along with the game.
************************************************
All pledges after $20 tier Includes Steam Key if the game gets Greenlit!
************************************************
Your name will be credited under "Special Thanks" if your pledge is $20-$40.
************************************************
Your name will be credited under "Supporter" if your pledge is $50 and up. (Additional Support)
************************************************
Your name will be credited under "Top Supporter" if you pledge under $1337. (Additional Support)
Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc! (Limited)\r\n************************************************ A DRM-free digital copy of the game for one of the supported PC platforms.
Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc!\r\n************************************************\r\nA DRM-free digital copy of the game for one of the supported PC platforms.

I collect game soundtracks!\r\n************************************************\r\nA DRM-free digital copy of the game for one of the supported PC platforms and a digital version of the game's soundtrack.

Beta + Soundtrack (Limited)
************************************************
Includes the game's digital soundtrack.
A DRM-free digital copy of the game for one of the supported PC platforms and allow access to private beta builds.
************************************************
Being apart of the beta allows you to provide feedback and access to the beta forums for you to discuss about the game as it develops!
